activities: We collect personal information form consumers who enroll in our membership program, and such information is used to provide the program to the consumer.  Information about such consumers is collected when consumers enroll in the program, as well as how they use the program.
personaldata: Manually processed data is included. We collect personal information during registration for memberships. From time to time we utilize Surveys and Sweepstakes. To improve security we utilized weblogs. Our site involves the use of cookies, but you can remove them if you choose.
